𓍖 ⋍ 𐂚 ⋍ 𓍘 ≠ 𓍑

𓍒 𓍑 𓍖 𓍘 𓌃

U32 𓍖 TZ Thin.der 𓍖 ⋍U28 Zan.der жар ža U32a 𓍗 zünder tinder sHaltz 𓎛𓌳𓄿𓏏𓍖𓈒𓏥 salt Salz

𓍖 bronze different reading to fire/phyr/pyro 𓍑 𓃀𓈞𓄑 ⲃⲁⲣⲱⲧ barōt

𓍖 bronze (⇔cremation) ⇔ 𓍘 𓅓 𓋴 𓏞 crimson! (red, ruddy, violet)
𓍖 bronze жарма žarma #ḥzmn 𓎛 𓊃 𓏠 𓈖 𓈓
𓍖 bronze ကြေး kre κρατέρωμα kratérōma χαλκός khalkós 青铜 qīngtóng

𓍖 vs 𓍘
𓍖 vs 𓍑 Ƒai (similar semantics with different phonetics)

faience 𓍘𓎛𓈖𓏏𓈒𓏥

Fz? wildcard fallacy

𓍘 ~ 𓍖 in 𓂧 𓈖 𓋴 𓍖 𓊌 dense dang dank tunk ತೂಕ tūka @ Dravidian <> thick dick 𓂧 𓈖 𓋴 𓍖 𓊌 canathta കനത്ത kanat̪t̪a @ Dravidian 𓆓 𓈖 𓋴 𓍘 𓏜 qanathta കനത്ത kanat̪t̪a @ Dravidian
